name: Molten Core
description: A raid deep within Blackrock Mountain, home of Ragnaros the Firelord.

bosses.name: Lucifron
bosses.mainMechanic: Curse the whole raid, adds can MC.

spells.name: Impending Doom
spells.desc: Inflicts 2000 shadow damage to nearby enemies after 10 sec

spells.name: Lucifron's Curse
spells.desc: Curses nearby enemies, increasing the costs of their spells and abilities by 100% for 5 min. This cost increase applies to all spells and abilities, whether they cost mana, rage, or energy.

spells.name: Dominate Mind
spells.desc: Controls a random player for 15 seconds.

spells.name: Cleave
spells.desc: 180° cleave up to 5 nearby targets.

roles.desc: be ready to start decursing once restorative potion is off.

bosses.strategy:
Kill adds first, melees be aware of your position to avoid cleave. NO AOE/CLEAVE to avoid kill your Mind control friend. 
Lucifron will cast on entire raid curses few seconds after the start of the fight : consume your restorative potion when you see the debuff.

bosses.name: Magmadar
bosses.mainMechanic: Spit fire in the room, don't stand in the fire, fire hurt .

spells.name: Panic
spells.desc: Fears nearby enemies for 8 seconds.

spells.name: Lava Bomb
spells.desc: Target a random ennemy player, and spit a Lava bomb dealing 3200 fire damage over 8sec.

spells.name: Frenzy
spells.desc: Increase his attack dammage

spells.name: Lava Breath​​
spells.desc: Cast a breath in front of him, dealing around 1100 damage

spells.name: Magma Spit
spells.desc: deals 100 Fire damage and an additional 75 Fire damage every 3 seconds for 30 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times on nearby ennemies

roles.desc: Coordinate a rotation of Tranquilizing Shot to dispel Frenzy as soon as possible.
Keep Fear Ward on the main tank and reapply it when it fades. Try to apply as much fear ward you can before the fight(warrior don't need it, they have enough tools)

bosses.strategy: Prepot a GFPP, use a other one if it's consummed. Melees do not go in until he uses his first panic. Casters and healers be spread in the room. Don't stay in the fire.

bosses.name: Gehennas
bosses.mainMechanic: Prepot GSPP, don't stay in rain of fire.

spells.name: Shadow Bolt​
spells.desc: 2000-2500 point shadow bolt on one random non-tank target.

spells.name: Rain of Fire
spells.desc: Deals fire damage in an area for 925 to 1075 Fire damage every 2 sec. for 6 sec.

spells.name: Fist of Ragnaros​
spells.desc: Stuns nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Sunder Armor​
spells.desc: reducing target armor by 1000 per Sunder Armor. Lasts 20 sec. Can stack up to 20 times.

spells.name: Strike
spells.desc: Strikes at an enemy, inflicting normal damage plus 35.

bosses.strategy: Prepot a GSPP and GFPP, kills adds first ( cleave and AOE allowed). Melee pop a FAP to counter Fist of Ragnaros effect

bosses.name: Garr
bosses.mainMechanic: Dispell your buff, better to boon for this boss.

spells.name: Antimagic Pulse
spells.desc: Dispels magic effects from nearby enemies.

spells.name: Magma shackles
spells.desc: reduce movement speed by 40%

spells.name: Immolate​
spells.desc: Inflicts 760 to 840 Fire damage to an enemy and scorches it for an additional 380 to 420 damage every 3 sec. for 21 sec.

spells.name: Eruption​
spells.desc: when they die, they explodes, inflicting 1850 to 2150 Fire damage to nearby enemies and make them fly

spells.name: Separation Anxiety​
spells.desc: If they are too far away from Garr, they will increase their damagee

roles.desc: Use all buffs you have, The more buffs you have, the more likely you are to have a useless one dispelled .

bosses.strategy: Adds will be tanked away from boss, healer must focus the add tank. Kill Garr first. Don't AOE adds once they reached 25%. Garr tank will pick up one add at the time, kill the add once he is on position. Melee go out before add die, or you could fly into some packs

bosses.name: Baron Geddon
bosses.mainMechanic: go away from raid if you have living bomb.

spells.name: Living Bomb
spells.desc: Afflicts a random player who will explode after 10 seconds. when explode it will also be send into the air and take fall damage. THIS SPELL CAN CRIT

spells.name: Ignite Mana
spells.desc: removes 400 mana per tick and does 400 damage to the target

spells.name: Inferno
spells.desc: Fire AOE around him, dealing more damage each pulse, last 10 seconds

bosses.strategy: Prepot GFPP. Players with Living Bomb must move away from the raid( see position, go to white dot).Melees run away when he start casting inferno, do not go back until it's off ( last tick can OS you)

bosses.name: Shazzrah

spells.name: Arcane Explosion
spells.desc: Deals 925 tp 1075 arcane damage to all nearby enemies.

spells.name: Shazzrah's Curse​
spells.desc: Increases the magical damage taken by nearby enemies by 100% for 5 min.

spells.name: Gate of Shazzrah
spells.desc: Teleports to a random target and reset his threat.

spells.name: Magic Grounding
spells.desc: Reduce the magical damage taken by 50% for 30sec

spells.name: Counterspell
spells.desc: Counters the spellcasting of nearby enemies, preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 10 sec.

roles.desc: Dicurse Shazzrah's curse, big prio on tank and meleee that go in.

bosses.strategy: Prepot a GAPP. 3 Groups would be made : one big pumper melee group ( if you are a fresh 60 melee, you will stay out for this fight) and two casters and healers group. Healers must be spread equally into this two groups. One tank will also be in each of this group. One Shazzrah teleport, run to his previous position.

bosses.name: Golemagg the Incinerator
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Magma Splash
spells.desc: Applies a stacking fire damage debuff to melee attackers.

spells.name: Golemagg's trust
spells.desc: Buff the core Ragers with 500 increased damages and +50% attack speed if they are close

spells.name: Pyroblast
spells.desc: Target a random play and deal 2000 fire damages and put a DoT that deal 200damage every 3sec for 12sec

spells.name: Earthquake
spells.desc: At 10% health, Golemagg will start cast it, dealing around 1400 damage per tick.

spells.name: Mangle
spells.desc: Reduces movement by 50% and deals 300 physical damage every 2 seconds

bosses.strategy: Tank him in place and swap tanks to manage debuff stacks. Melees stop fight once you reach around 6 or 7 stacks debuff. Melees go out once he reached 10% hp or be ready to pop a Free Action Potion

bosses.name: Sulfuron Harbinger
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Inspire
spells.desc: Buffs nearby allies, increasing their damage by 25% and double his attack speed.

spells.name: Hand of Ragnaros​
spells.desc: Inflict fire damages, knocking them back and stun them for 2sec

spells.name: Flame Spear
spells.desc: Aoe fire spell

spells.name: Dark Mending
spells.desc: heal a ally for237500 to 262500 damage

spells.name: Dark Strike
spells.desc: Consecrates the caster's weapon, inflicting 1026 to 1134 additional damage on its next attack

spells.name: Immolate
spells.desc: deal fire damage to the target

spells.name: Shadow word : Pain
spells.desc: inflicting Shadow damage to an enemy every 3 sec. for 15 sec.

roles.desc: Be ready to kick/pummel Dark mending, short casting time.

bosses.strategy: The key of the fight is to kick/pummel Dark Mending. one rogue and warrior will be assign to each add, to stop first or second cast. Cleave/AOE them to death then kill Sulfuron.

bosses.name: Majordomo Executus
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Aegis of Ragnaros​
spells.desc: Absorb 30 000damages, reflect 250 damages on melee attacks and heal himself to full.

spells.name: Magic Reflection
spells.desc: Reflect any spell cast, last 10sec

spells.name: Damage shield
spells.desc: Reflext 100 damages on melee attacks, last 10sec

spells.name: Teleport
spells.desc: Teleport a player into the fiery pit and reset threat

spells.name: Blast Wave
spells.desc: Deal fire damage to nearby ennemies

spells.name: Fire Blast
spells.desc: deal fire damage to his target

spells.name: Magic Reflection
spells.desc: Reflect any spell cast, last 10sec

spells.name: Damage shield
spells.desc: Reflext 100 damages on melee attacks, last 10sec

spells.name: Blast Wave
spells.desc: Deal fire damage to nearby ennemies

spells.name: Shadow Bolts
spells.desc: Target a random player and deal around 1000 shadow damages

spells.name: Magic Reflection
spells.desc: Reflect any spell cast, last 10sec

spells.name: Damage shield
spells.desc: Reflext 100 damages on melee attacks, last 10sec

spells.name: Heal
spells.desc: Can heal any other mob

bosses.strategy: This fight is mostly control fight. Flamewalker Elites can't be CC, they have to be tanked or kited (depends of group composition). Flamewalker Healers can be sheep.  nuke one add at the time, do not cleave to avoid breaking sheep. Follow carefully the new skull target. After 4 adds died, remains adds will be immune to sheep. Mages and warlock be really carefull with Magic reflection, you can blast yourself really quickly

bosses.name: Ragnaros
bosses.mainMechanic: Fait exploser un joueur aléatoire (Living Bomb), éloignez-vous du raid.

spells.name: Wrath of Ragnaros
spells.desc: Knocks back nearby enemies and deals fire damage.

spells.name: Sons of Flame
spells.desc: Summons fire elementals during submerge phase.

bosses.strategy: Stay max range to avoid knockbacks. Manage submerge phases by controlling and killing Sons of Flame quickly. Use fire resist gear.
